content: shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Innum ee aayushkaalatthum nammute addhuyakshanmaaraayirunnu naalu bhaagangalilumulla dyvatthinte vishuddhasabhakale meyicchu bharikkunna shuddhimaanmaarum bahumaanappettavarum, bhaagyavaanmaarumaayi dyvatthaal nilanirtthappettuporunna nammute paathriyarkkeesanmaaraaya aaboon maar ignaatthiyosinu vendiyum (moraan maar baseliyosu maartthommaa maathyoosu thruthiyan) kaatholikkaa baavaaykkuvendiyum aaboon maar greegoriyosinuvendiyum nammute melppattakkaaran aaboon maar (innaarkku) vendiyum, sathya vishvaasikalaaya sheshamulla sakala eppiskoppanmaarkku vendiyum mahatthum bhayankaravum, parishuddhavumaaya ee samayatthu dyvamaaya kartthaavinotu naam apekshicchu praarththikkaam.

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Sarvvashakthiyulla dyvamaaya kartthaave, palavidhamaaya kadtinapareekshakalil akappettu ninnil aashrayicchirikkunnavarute rakshaykku vendiyum vegatthil nee avare darshikkunnathinuvendiyum ee naazhikayilum, ee samayatthum njangal orkkuvaanaayittu nisaararum balaheenarumaaya njangalotu munkootti kalpicchu njangale thaalpparyappetutthiyittulla vishvaasikalum sathyakristhyaanikalumaaya njangalute sahodarangale ellaavareyum njangal orkkunnu. Dyvatthaal paalikkappettirikkunna ee vishuddhasabhayute makkalaakunna vishvaasikalaaya ellaavarkkum anyonyam aikyavum abhivruddhiyum undaakuvaanaayittum avar sukruthamullavaraayittheeruvaanaayittum kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Naalu bhaagangalilumulla dyvatthinte sabhakaleyum dayaraakaleyum sathyavishvaasatthil nilanirtthi urappiccha, vishvaasikalum sathyakristhyaanikalumaaya sakala bharanakartthaakkaleyum njangal orkkunnu. Pattakkaarum vishvaasikalaaya janangalute samghavum kristhyaanisamooham muzhuvanum sukruthamullavaraayittheeruvaanaayittu kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Bhoomiyile sakala vamshangalilninnu bhaagyangalkkyogyathayullavalum vishuddhiyullavalum, mahatthuvamullavalum anugrahikkappettavalum, nithyakanyakayum bhaagyavathiyumaaya dyvamaathaavaaya mariyaamine njangal orkkunnu. Avalotukoote parishuddhamaaraaya nibiyanmaareyum, prasamgakkaaraaya shleehanmaareyum evangelisthanmaareyum, sahadenmaareyum, maudyaananmaareyum bhaagyavaanum thante yajamaanante munnottakkaaranumaaya maar yoohaanon maamdaanayeyum shemmaashanmaaril pradhaaniyum, sahadenmaaril mumpanumaaya parishuddhanum, mahatthuvamullavanumaaya maar stheppaanosineyum shleehanmaaril thalavanmaaraaya unnathappetta maar pathrosineyum maar pauloosineyum nammute kaaval pithaavaaya maartthommaa shleehaayeyum shesham sakala shuddhimaanmaareyum shuddhimathikaleyum onnupole naam orkkanam. Avarute praarththana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.

shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Shlyhikavum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalicchu njangalkku elppicchu thannavaraaya shuddhimaanmaarute sthalatthu shuddhathayote mumpukootti nidrapraapicchu vishramikkunnavareyum nikhyaayilum kusthantheenopoleesilum eppesosilum vacchundaaya punyappettavayum, parishuddhangalumaaya moonnu pothusunnahadosukaleyum, avayilundaayirunna neethimaanmaarum, malppaanmaarum sthuthikkappettavarum, dyvatthe dharicchavarumaaya njangalute pithaakkanmaareyum oorshlemin്re onnaamatthe pradhaanaachaaryanum, punyavaanum shleehaayum sahadaayumaaya yaakkobum, ignaathyosum, kleemmeesum deevannaasyosum, atthaanaasyosum yooliyosum, baseliyosum greegoriyosum, deeyaskorosum theemotthiyosum, peelaksinosum antheemosum, eeyaavaaneesum vachanamaaya dyvam shareeriyaayittheernnuvennu nammute kartthaaveshumishihaayute manushyaavathaaratthekkuricchu spashtamaayi theliyicchavanum sathyavaanum, unnathagopuravumaaya prasiddhanaaya maar koorilosum suriyaanikkaarute kireetavum dyvatthin്re vishuddhasabha muzhuvanteyum vivekamulla vaayum, thoonum, malppaanum pushpangal kondu niranja mecchilsthalavum mariyaam samshayam kootaathe dyvamaathaavennu ellaayppozhum prasamgicchavanumaaya njangalute paathriyarkkeesu maar severiyosum sathya vishvaasatthe nilanirtthiya neethimaanum parishuddhanumaaya njangalute baavaa maar yaakkobu burdaanaayum maar apremum, maar yaakkobum maar ishaakkum, maar baalaayiyum duakhithanmaaril thalavanaaya maar barsaummaayum, maar shemavon desthuniyum theranjetukkappetta maar abahaayum yaldo maar baseliyosum malankarayile parishuddhanmaaraaya maar greegoriyosum maar deevannaasyosum aaya njangalute pithaakkanmaareyum chovullathum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalicchu njangalkku elppicchuthannavaraayi ivarute mumpum, ivarotukooteyum, ivarute sheshamullavareyum njangal orkkunnu. Avarute praarththana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.

items.content: shushrooshakkaaran: baarekmor. Shlyhikavum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalicchu njangalkku elpicchuthannavaraayi, shuddhimaanmaarute sthalatthu shuddhathayote mumpukootti nidrapraapicchu vishramikkunnavareyum, nikhyaayilum kusthantheenopoleesilum, eppesosilum vacchundaaya punyappettavayum, parishuddhangalumaaya moonnu pothusunnahadosukaleyum, avayil sambandhicchavaraaya njangalute pithaakkanmaareyum, oorshleminte onnaamatthe pradhaanaachaaryanaaya maar yaakkobum, maar ignaathyosu nooronoyum, maar apremum, kappadokyaayile maar baseliyosum, maar greegoriyosum, svarnnanaavukaaranaaya maar eevaaniyosum, alaksanthriyaayile maar atthaanaasyosum, maar kooreelosum, maar deeyaskorosum maaboogile maar peelaksinosum, anthyokhyaayile maar severiyosum, sroogile maar yaakkobum, maar yaakkobu burdaanaayum, maar baalaayiyum, yaldo maar baseliyosum, parumala maar greegoriyosum, sabhaabhaasuran geevargeesu maar deevannaasyosumaaya njangalute pithaakkanmaareyum, shreshdtam itayanmaaraayi malankara sabhaye meyicchu bharicchavaraaya ellaa parishuddha pithaakkanmaareyum njangal orkkunnu. Chovullathum kuttamillaatthathumaaya eka vishvaasatthe paalicchu njangalkku elpicchuthannavaraayi, ivarute mumpum, ivarotukooteyum ivarute pimpullavareyum njangal orkkunnu. Avarute praarththana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.
Janam : kuriye-laayson

content: shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Aroopikaluteyum sakala jadangaluteyum utayavanaayirikkunna pithaavaam dyvame, sathyavishvaasatthil munkootti nidrapraapicchu vishramicchu ninte atukkal vannuchernnavaraaya ee parishuddha madbahaayil ninnum ee palliyilninnum ee sthalatthuninnum, ellaa bhaagangalilninnum snehatthotum sathyavishvaasatthotum kooti vaangippoyirikkunna vishvaasikalaaya sakala maricchupoyavareyum njangal orkkunnu. Avarute aathmaakkaleyum aroopikaleyum thante atukkalekku etutthukondavanaaya nammute dyvamaaya mashihaayotu dhaaraalamaaya thante anugrahangalmoolam katangalute parihaaratthinum, paapamochanatthinum avare yogyaraakkuvaanum nammeyum avareyum thante svarggaraajyatthil chertthukolluvaanumaayi naam apekshicchu praarththicchu moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayison ennu attahasicchu parayanam.

janam :- (dyvame!) sathyavishvaasatthotukooti njangalilninnu vaangippoyirikkunna sakala maricchavareyum nee aashvasippicchu punyappetutthaname. Manasotum manasukootaatheyum arivotum arivu kootaatheyum nin്re thirumumpil njangalum avarum cheythupoyittulla pizhakal kshamikkaname.
janam : aammeen. (than്re thirunaamam) irunnaprakaaram thanne irikkukayum thalamura thalamurakalaayi sakala thalamurakalvareyum lokaalokangalolavum sthithicheyyukayum cheyyunnu. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran :- (patinjaarottu thirinju rooshmaa cheythukondu) valiyavanum nammute rakshakanumaaya yeshumashihaayaakunna dyvatthinte karuna…

1. Anputayo-ne nin vaathil
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
muttunnu-daa-sar naadam
kuriye-laa-yison.

4. Vaathil thura-nnee-praarththanayin
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
naadam ke-tte-keetename.
Kuriye-laa-yison.

5. Ninne vili-kku-nne naathaa!
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
nin uthavi-kkaay-balaheenar.
Kuriye-laa-yison

6. Nallavane - kaa-runyatthaal
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
nalkaname - yaa-chippukale
kuriye-laa-yison.

7. Kartthaave - kaa-runyatthaal
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
kanivatiyaa-ril - cheyyename.
Kuriye-laa-yison.

8. Nanmanira-njaa-ne ente
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
thinmakale - nee- orkkaruthe.
Kuriye-laa-yison.

items.content:
1. Sraappikale kandashaayaa
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
beskkudishaa-yil - ninmumpil.
Kuriye-laa-yison.

2. Chirakukalaa-raa-rullavaraayu
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
eritheeyaa-maa-thmaakkalavar.
Kuriye-laa-yison

3 kaanaayu vaan - nin-dyvathvam
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
mukhamavar mu-tu-nniru chirakaal.
Kuriye-laa-yison

4 eriyaayvaan - nin jvaalayathil
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
iru chirakaa-le - kaalukalum
kuriye-laa-yison

5. Attahasi-kku-nniru chirakum
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
kottiyavar - ni-nnittevam.
Kuriye-laa-yison

6. Parishuddhan nee - parishuddhan
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
parishuddhan - nee - dyvasuthaa!
Kuriye-laa-yison.

7. Parishuddhan - nee - nin pakkal
haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
nin bahumaa-nam - sthuthyamaho.
Kuriye-laa-yison

shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangale, nirappin്reyum samadhaanatthin്reyum anugrahangaluteyum karunayuteyum duthinu nin്re anugrahangalaal njangal yogyaraayittheeraname ennu ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaave! Nin്re karunayaal njangalkku samgathiyaakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangale, pallikalkku nirappum dayaraakalkku samaadhaanavum avayile pattakkaarkku nalla kaavalum avayute prajakalkku pushtiyulla kaalavum undaakuvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave, nin്re karunayaal njangale samaadhaanappetutthaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangale, sathpravartthikalaalum neethiyulla vetippaaya punyanatapatikalaalum dyvatthinishtamulla sathyakristhyaanikalaayirippaan ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave! Nin്re karunayaal njangale yogyaraakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangale, naamum nammute maricchupoyavarum, nammute samooham okkeyum, ketaattha agniyilninnum, chaakaattha puzhuvilninnum, kadtinamaaya vedanayilninnum, kaypperiya karacchililninnum, avasaanamillaattha pallukatiyilninnum rakshapetuvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave! Nin്re sleebaayaal-njangale rakshikkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- shapikkappettavare, ningal en്re atutthuninnu poyi dushtanmaareyum anyaayakkaareyum dahippikkunna agni avakaashamaayi anubhavicchukolluvin ennu itathubhaagatthullavarotu parayunna kaypperiyathum, maranakaravumaaya shabdatthilninnu rakshapetuvaanaayi, en്re sahodarangale, ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaave! Nin്re sleebaayaal njangale rakshikkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- ente pithaavinaal anugrahikkappettavare! Vannu akatthu praveshicchu, lokaarambhatthinu mumpu ningalkkaayi orukkappettirikkunna raajyam avakaashamaayi anubhavicchukolluvin ennu valathubhaagatthullavarotu parayunna santhoshakaramaaya shabdatthinu naam yogyaraayittheeruvaanaayi, en്re sahodarangale! Ellaayppozhum naam kartthaavinotu apekshikkanam.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaave! Ninte krupayaal njangale yogyaraakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran : njangalute dyvamaaya kartthaave, ninte anugrahangalaalum karunayaalum rogikalkku poornnasaukhyavum, njerukkatthilirikkunnavarkku aashvaasavum bandhikkappettirikkunnavarkku vituthalum akale poyirikkunnavarkku thiricchuvaravum sameepastharkku kaavalum (nalkaname). Bhinnicchirikkunnavarkku aikyavum snehavum chinnippoyirikkunnavarkku orumippum kaanaathepoyirikkunnavarkku kandetthalum vilapicchirikkunnavarkku aashvaasavum ksheenicchirikkunnavarkku vishramavum agathikalkku santhushtiyum vidhavamaarkku manodhyryavum sahaayavum daridrarkku poshanavum samthrupthiyum paapikalkku poornnamochanavum (nalkaname). Aachaaryathvatthinu nalla unnathiyum shushrooshakarkku venmayum kotukkukayum nin്re nirappu, bhoomiyile raajyangalil vaazhukayum yuddhangalkku othukkavum, maricchavarkku aashvaasavum njangalkku katangaluteyum paapangaluteyum mochanavum nalkaname.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaave, nin്re krupayaal njangalkku iva nalkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangale, veendum dyvamaathaavaaya vishuddha mariyaaminekkuricchum parishuddhanmaarekkuricchum, vishvaasikalaaya maricchupoyavarekkuricchum nalla ormma undaakuvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.
Janam :- avarute praarththana - namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Aammeen.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- nammute mashihaathampuraanotu nammuteyum, nammute maathaapithaakkaluteyum sahodari sahodaranmaaruteyum, nethaakkaluteyum gurukkanmaaruteyum, maricchupoyavaruteyum anyonyam naam ororuttharuteyum aathmaakkalkkaayi dhaaraalamaayi anugrahangalum karunayum naam yaachicchu. Veendum yaachikkukayum cheyyunnu. Sakalatthinum utayavanaayirikkunna pithaavaam dyvatthe naam sthothram cheyyukayum thante ekaputhrane vandikkukayum jeevanulla than്re vishuddha roohaaye mahatthuvappetutthukayum karunayullavanaaya kartthaavin്re thrukkykalil nammute jeevane bharamelppicchu thannotu anugrahangal yaachikkukayum cheyyanam.
Janam : utthamanaayullove, karuna thonni njangalute mel anugraham cheyyaname.

shushrooshakkaaran: janmadinavum vivaahavaarshikavum aacharikkunna nammute maathaapithaakkalkkum sahodaree sahodaranmaarkkum vendi nammute kartthaavinotu dhaaraalamaayi anugrahangalum karunayum naam yaachicchu. Veendum avarkku anugrahangal labhikkunnathinu vendiyum samaadhaanatthilum shaanthiyilum avar jeevikkunna thinuvendiyum prathisandhikalil ninnum prathikoolathakalil ninnum avar kaatthukollappetunnathinu vendiyum dyvaraajyatthinte avakaashikal aakunnathinuvendiyum ellaayppozhum kartthaavinotu naam praarththikkanam.
Janam : njangalute kartthaave, nin്re krupayaal avarkku iva saujanyamaayi nalkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran : njangalute kartthaave, nin്re karunayaal bandhitharum rogikalum anaatharum daridrarum peedditharum palatharam prayaasangalil valayunnavarumaaya ellaavareyum nee ortthukollaname. Prathyekaal, ee dinangalil janmadinam aacharikkunna nin്re makkale njangal thirusannidhiyil samarppikkunnu. Avarute jeevitham nirantharam ninne mahathvappetutthuvaanum snehatthilum santhoshatthilum deerghaayusilum avar valaruvaanum ninte krupa avarkku dhaaraalamaayi nalkaname. Avarotoppam vivaaha vaarshikam aacharikkunna nin്re makkaleyum njangal orkkunnu. Paraspara snehatthin്reyum karuthalin്reyum pankaalitthatthin്reyum aathmaavilla kutumba jeevithatthin്re paripaavanatha kaatthusookshikkuvaan nin്re sahaayam avarkku nee nalkaname.
Janam : njangalute kartthaave, nin്re karunayaal avarute praarththanakale nee kelkkename.
